New Records: Suryakumar Yadav scored his third T20I century, his first at home.
Key Match Events: Suryakumar Yadav scored a scintillating 112 not out off 51 balls.
Sri Lanka was bundled out for 137 in 16.4 overs.
Arshdeep Singh took 3 wickets for 20 runs.
Hardik Pandya, Yuzvendra Chahal, and Umran Malik each took 2 wickets.
India won the match by 91 runs to seal the series 2-1.
Post-Match Reflections: The victory is bound to boost the youngsters' morale.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Sri Lanka had a good start, adding 44 runs without loss inside five overs.
Sri Lanka was reduced to 51 for 3 in 6.1 overs from 44 for 0 in 4.4 overs.
India's bowlers bowled a no ball and 11 wides, including four by Arshdeep.
India collected 53 for the loss of two wickets in the powerplay.
Suryakumar Yadav hit nine sixes and seven fours in his blazing knock.
